story_parts.text: I was in second grade and I loved it. I loved learning new things and being with my friends. My favorite subject was math. I loved solving problems and figuring things out. My teacher was Mrs. Nguyen and she was really nice. She would always help us if we needed it. I remember one time I was having trouble with my multiplication and she helped me until I understood it. I am so grateful to her for that. I also loved recess and lunchtime. I would always

next_options.0: I would always play tag with my friends
next_options.1: I would always eat my lunch with my friends

story_parts.text: I would always play tag with my friends during recess. I was really fast and I loved to run around. My friends would always laugh and say that I was like a little rabbit. I was always so happy when I was with them. I loved hearing their laughter and just having fun. I remember one time, we were playing tag and I ran so fast that I accidentally ran into one of the girls. She fell down and started crying. I felt so bad and I started crying too

next_options.0: I ran over to her and helped her up
next_options.1: I just stood there and stared at her

story_parts.text: I just stood there and stared at her. I didn't know what to do. I felt so bad that I had made her cry. I just wanted to make it better. I didn't know how. I wished that Mrs. Nguyen was there to help me. I didn't know what to do. I just stood there until the girl stopped crying. Then I helped her up and we went back to playing. I was so happy that I could make her smile again.

next_options.0: The girl and I became friends and we played together all the time
next_options.1: I never saw the girl again

quiz_parts.question: What did the protagonist do when he made the girl cry?

options.0: Stood there until she stopped crying
